import React, { useState } from 'react' import Authors from './components/Authors' import Books from './components/Books' import NewBook from './components/NewBook' import { gql, useQuery } from '@apollo/client' const ALL_AUTHORS = gql` query { allAuthors { name born bookCount } } ` const App = () => { const result = useQuery(ALL_AUTHORS) const [page, setPage] = useState('authors') return (
born books
a b c
) } export default App
